app_page_content.heading: Instructions
content: AlbyHub Your Own Center for Internet Money. You can open the app with the Open button on the left (if web based).
On first login non-recoverable password will be created.
Configuration with LDK will create non-custodial Lighning Node.
Lightning node uses external services for Bitcoin Blockchain data and indexes. So disk space usage of albyHub is minimal.
Reinstall and uninstall will delete your data!
You can open the app with the Open button on the left.
